Method Detail

  • sendMail(emailMessage, callback)

    Spawns a 'sendmail -t' command and streams the outgoing message to sendmail stdin. Return callback checks if the sendmail process ended with 0 (no error) or not.

    Parameters:
    {Object} emailMessage
    MailComposer object
    {Function} callback
    Callback function to run when the sending is completed
